import React from"react";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import SLUGS from"../../resources/slugs";import{convertSlugUrl}from"../../resources/utils";import LogoComponent from"./Logo";import Menu from"./MenuComponent";import MenuItem from"./MenuItem";import{GrDocument}from"react-icons/gr";import{ImInsertTemplate,ImLifebuoy}from"react-icons/im";import PermIdentityIcon from"@material-ui/icons/PermIdentity";import EmojiTransportationIcon from"@material-ui/icons/EmojiTransportation";import RotateLeftIcon from"@material-ui/icons/RotateLeft";import ClearAllIcon from"@material-ui/icons/ClearAll";import{GiScales}from"react-icons/gi";import{VscSettingsGear}from"react-icons/vsc";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SidebarComponent(){var _useHistory=useHistory(),push=_useHistory.push;var isMobile=window.innerWidth<=1080;function _onClick(slug){var parameters=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};push(convertSlugUrl(slug,parameters));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Menu,{isMobile:isMobile,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{paddingTop:18,paddingBottom:10},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LogoComponent,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{id:SLUGS.agreements,title:"Agreements",icon:GrDocument,onClick:function onClick(){return _onClick(SLUGS.agreements);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{id:SLUGS.templates,title:"Templates",icon:ImInsertTemplate,onClick:function onClick(){return _onClick(SLUGS.templates);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{id:SLUGS.lawyers,title:"Lawyers",icon:GiScales,onClick:function onClick(){return _onClick(SLUGS.lawyers);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{id:SLUGS.supportTickets,title:"Support Tickets",icon:ImLifebuoy,onClick:function onClick(){return _onClick(SLUGS.supportTickets);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MenuItem//id={SLUGS.settings}
,{items:[SLUGS.profileSettings,SLUGS.companySettings,SLUGS.subscriptions,SLUGS.invoices],title:"Settings",icon:VscSettingsGear,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{id:SLUGS.profileSettings,title:"Profile Settings",icon:PermIdentityIcon,onClick:function onClick(){return _onClick(SLUGS.profileSettings);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{id:SLUGS.companySettings,title:"Company Settings",icon:EmojiTransportationIcon,onClick:function onClick(){return _onClick(SLUGS.companySettings);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{id:SLUGS.subscriptions,title:"Subscriptions",icon:RotateLeftIcon,onClick:function onClick(){return _onClick(SLUGS.subscriptions);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{id:SLUGS.invoices,title:"Invoices",icon:ClearAllIcon,onClick:function onClick(){return _onClick(SLUGS.invoices);}})]})]});}export default SidebarComponent;
